Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Paradise Island Resort & Spa in Lankanfinolhu (North Male Atoll), you'll be minutes from Paradise Island Beach and close to Gili Lankanfushi Beach. This 4-star resort is within the vicinity of Full Moon Beach and Banana Reef Dive Site.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 282 guestrooms featuring minibars. Rooms have private furnished patios. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature bidets and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find outdoor tennis courts, an outdoor pool, and a spa tub. Additional features include wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and babysitting/childcare.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the resort's dining establishments, which include 5 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a beach bar or a poolside bar. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a business center, and express check-in. Event facilities at this resort consist of a conference center and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge during limited hours.


Check-in time starts at 1 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at one of the resort's dining establishments, which include 5 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a beach bar or a poolside bar. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Additional features include wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and babysitting/childcare.
Make yourself at home in one of the 282 guestrooms featuring minibars. Rooms have private furnished patios. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature bidets and hair dryers.

With a stay at Paradise Island Resort & Spa in Lankanfinolhu (North Male Atoll), you'll be minutes from Paradise Island Beach and close to Gili Lankanfushi Beach. This 4-star resort is within the vicinity of Full Moon Beach and Banana Reef Dive Site.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Paradise Island Beach - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Gili Lankanfushi Beach - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Full Moon Beach - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi
Banana Reef Dive Site - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
Dhonveli Beach - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
Kuda Bandos Beach - 6.4 km / 4 mi
Bandos Beach - 7.3 km / 4.5 mi
Kurumba Beach - 7.6 km / 4.7 mi
Thulhagiri Beach - 8 km / 5 mi
Kani Beach - 8.9 km / 5.5 mi
Victory Wreck Dive Site - 12.4 km / 7.7 mi
Male Fish Market - 12.7 km / 7.9 mi
Republic Square - 12.7 km / 7.9 mi
Medhu Ziyaaraiy - 12.8 km / 7.9 mi
People's Majlis - 12.8 km / 7.9 mi

The preferred airport for Paradise Island Resort & Spa is Male (MLE-Male Intl.) - 11.5 km / 7.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Message.Text:
Essential Information: Room 1


Additional Service Return Speed Boat Transfers is included
Hotel Tariff Notes: No show and early checkout will be charged 100% of the reserved booking. Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated. Acceptable currencies in Paradise Island Resort are Unites Sates Dollars, Euros, Travelers Cheques and credit cards- VISA, MASTER and AMEX
